component.name: Fotos
component.summary: AI-powered screenshot capture, annotation, and analysis

description.p: Fotos is a screenshot tool with built-in annotation and AI capabilities. Capture your screen, annotate with shapes, arrows, text, and highlights, then use OCR or AI analysis to extract and process information from images.

ul.li: Annotation tools: rectangles, arrows, ellipses, freehand, text, step markers
Blur and highlight tools for privacy and emphasis
OCR text extraction with automatic PII detection and blur
AI image analysis via configurable LLM providers
Export annotations to JSON for round-trip editing
Copy to clipboard or save as PNG/JPEG/WebP

screenshot.caption: Annotating a screenshot with arrows and text

description.p: OCR bounding boxes, PII auto-blur, and font embedding for PNG export.
